*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Horatio Chriesman, April 1, 1825. Order to go with a force of militia to arrest Andrew Valentine and others at the house of Sartuche on Trinity River*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p*Having received information at seven o'clock in the *date_mentioned n="04-01-1825">afternoon of this day*/date_mentioned* that the within mentioned*person_mentioned* Andrew Valentine*/person_mentioned* together with his *person_mentioned*companions*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mariano Mora*/person_mentioned* one *person_mentioned*Chocolatero*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*others of his associates*/person_mentioned* are stopped on the *location_mentioned*Trinity River*/location_mentioned* at the *location_mentioned*Crossing of the La Bahia Road*/location_mentioned* at the *location_mentioned*House of one *person_mentioned*Sartuche*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*. */p* *p*Therefore in compliance with the above order of the Acting *person_mentioned*Governor of the Department of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* */person_mentioned*and in the name of the *location_mentioned*Mexican Republic*/location_mentioned* I command you to collect a sufficient Number of the *person_mentioned*National Militia of this Colony*/person_mentioned* to follow and make *person_mentioned*prisoners*/person_mentioned* the said *person_mentioned*Valentine*/person_mentioned* and his *person_mentioned*companions*/person_mentioned* wherever they may be found and to take possession of everything they have with them bringing them and the property taken forthwith to this *location_mentioned*Town*/location_mentioned* under strict guard that I may send them on to the *person_mentioned*Superior Authority*/person_mentioned* as *person_mentioned*Prisoners */person_mentioned*In compliance with the foregoing order. Useing arms should they make resistance. Thus I *person_mentioned*Stephen F. AustinLieut Col. of the Militia */person_mentioned*of this *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Judge Commissioner*/person_mentioned* therefor Command and order to be executed.*/p*
*p*Given in the *location_mentioned*Town of San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="04-01-1825">1st Apil 1825*/date_mentioned* */p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Samuel M. Williams*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Secretary of the Colony*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*To *person_mentioned*Citizen Horatio Chrisman*/person_mentioned**person_mentioned* Captain of Militia*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
